price: Anaasε nkuro no so foͻ no ho atͻ wͻn wͻ Y’asotwee a εbεba wͻn so anͻpa aberε a wͻredi agorͻ no ho?
arabic: أَوَأَمِنَ أَهۡلُ ٱلۡقُرَىٰٓ أَن يَأۡتِيَهُم بَأۡسُنَا ضُحٗى وَهُمۡ يَلۡعَبُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: awa-amina ahlu al-qurā an yatiyahum basunā ḍuḥan wahum yalʿabūna
